summary: This is a forwarded email from June 29, 2010, arranging a meeting for Jeffrey Epstein at his New York City home on July 8, 2010, at 5:00 PM. The email provides his address and indicates a follow-up confirmation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email is about arranging a meeting at his home. He is the person the visitor is coming to see.

events.title: Scheduled Meeting at Epstein's Home
events.description: A meeting was scheduled for 5:00 PM at Jeffrey Epstein's New York City residence.

locations: 9 East 71st Street, New York, NY (between 5th and Madison Avenues)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was residing at 9 East 71st Street in New York City as of June/July 2010.
A meeting was scheduled at his home for July 8, 2010, at 5:00 PM.
The correspondence shows active scheduling of social or business meetings at his residence post-2008 conviction.
